title: Sharp to release R2 million, 8K TV
text: Sharp to release R2 million, 8K TV September 16 2015 at 02:01pm By IOL Staff Comment on this story Got a bit of spare cash lying around? Want a new TV to impress your friends? Then October 31 is your lucky day. On that day Sharp will release its 85-inch 8K television which clocks in with an eye-watering price tag of 16 million yen, or around R1,8 million. As reported by AV Watch the LV-85001 will feature a 7680 X 4320 screen and Sharp says it has a viewing angle of 176-degrees. Initially the company expects to sell this to business customers but no doubt there will be someone with more money than sense that will snap up this fine deal. Please read our comment guidelines .
